import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";var initialState={currentUser:null};export var userReducer=createSlice({name:"user",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setUser:function setUser(state,action){state.currentUser=action.payload;},clearUser:function clearUser(state,action){state.currentUser=null;}}});// Action creators are generated for each case reducer function
var _userReducer$actions=userReducer.actions,setUser=_userReducer$actions.setUser,clearUser=_userReducer$actions.clearUser;export{setUser,clearUser};export default userReducer.reducer;
